matrix_functions module¶

matrix_functions.Phi_poly_ctor(deg)[source]¶

Ctor.

>>> from matrix_functions import Phi_poly_ctor
>>> p = Phi_poly_ctor(deg=3)
>>> p
Eq(\Phi(z, i, j), z**3*\phi[i, j, 0] + z**2*\phi[i, j, 1] + z*\phi[i, j, 2] + \phi[i, j, 3])
\[\Phi{\left (z,i,j \right )} = z^{3} \phi_{i,j,0} + z^{2} \phi_{i,j,1} + z \phi_{i,j,2} + \phi_{i,j,3}\]
